name: Orc Connection
description:
Avoid the nasty projectiles while finding the function boxes in order to connect the wires to kill the orcs! Orc Connection is a short game where you need to dodge balls of magic thrown by orcs. The orcs can only be killed by connecting the wires at junction boxes placed along walls. Some boxes kill only certain orcs, so stay on your toes!

This is a project developed in two days for Ryan Laley's 2023 Game Jam.

There are four levels. The game is built for Windows and can be played with either keyboard & mouse or controller.

Known bugs:

  • Projectiles from other arenas will occasionally go through walls
  • Especially in level 3 or later, sometimes dying will not take you back to the main menu
